Greetings:

I am Rodrigo Juri. I belonged to that forum a year ago, but I c=
hanged
my email, so I recently, indeed just today, I have get into it again=
.
I posted very few thing, mainly questions, and I will be always be in
deb=
t with one of yours that suggested me to check Deux Destroyed for
my resear=
ch.
Well, my research has taken me finnaly to the doors of the Imperial
Pal=
ace, and it seems that I will be here for a long time.
So, do you know abou=
t conferences or conventions for people like you
or me (gaijin desu), in To=
kyo area, that would like to speak and hear
about medieval history in Japan=
? I mean... not truly academic ones,
but neither anime-like ones. Although,=
 if a truly academic one is open
for public, could be of help anyway.

And.=
.. how many of yours are in Tokyo actually? Do you do same kind of
periodic=
al meetings or convention? I would like to join such kind of
effort, if it =
is possible. 
 
Ahhh... please forgive my bad english... I am not a native =
english
speaker, I am chilean so far.

Thank you everybody.
